name: Design requirements
description: This document contains the design requirements of the Elegoo Tumbller AI project.

requirements.name: Product description
requirements.description: This requirement describes key features of the Elegoo Tumbller robot.

subrequirements.name: Physical description
subrequirements.description: The robot is a self-balancing robotic kit consisting of 2 wheels, a chassis, and a control platform. The wheels are driven by two electric motors. The chassis is made of aluminium and plastic, and has a compact vertical design.

subrequirements.name: Control platform
subrequirements.description: The main controller of the robot is an Arduino nano board.

subrequirements.name: Microcontroller
subrequirements.description: The microcontroller used on the controller platform is an ATmega328P-AU from Microchip Technology.

subrequirements.name: Power Supply
subrequirements.description: The robot is powered by a 3S rechargeable Li-ion battery.

subrequirements.name: Sensors
subrequirements.description: This requirement describes the sensors available on the robot platform.

subrequirements.name: Battery voltage sensor
subrequirements.description: This requirement describes the battery voltage sensor.

subrequirements.name: Type
subrequirements.description: The battery voltage sensor is implemented with a resistive voltage divider.

subrequirements.name: IR sensors
subrequirements.description: This requirement describes the IR sensors of the robot.

subrequirements.name: Location
subrequirements.description: The IR sensors are located on the front-left and front-right corners of the robot.

subrequirements.name: Orientation
subrequirements.description: The IR sensors are oriented at 45 degrees towards the sides.

subrequirements.name: Type
subrequirements.description: The IR sensors part number is IRM-56384.

subrequirements.name: Ultrasonic sensor
subrequirements.description: This requirement describes the ultrasonic sensor of the robot.

subrequirements.name: Location
subrequirements.description: The ultrasonic sensor is located at the front of the robot.

subrequirements.name: Orientation
subrequirements.description: The ultrasonic sensor is oriented to the forward direction of the robot, parallel to the floor while the robot is balancing.

subrequirements.name: Type
subrequirements.description: The ultrasonic sensor is a HC-SR04.

subrequirements.name: Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU)
subrequirements.description: The robot uses an IMU for acceleration and orientation tracking.

subrequirements.name: 3-axis accelerometer
subrequirements.description: The IMU includes a 3-axis accelerometer to detect the robot's acceleration.

subrequirements.name: 3-axis gyroscope
subrequirements.description: The IMU includes a 3-axis gyroscope to detect the robot's angular momentum.

subrequirements.name: Type
subrequirements.description: The IMU is a MPU-6050.

subrequirements.name: Communication
subrequirements.description: The IMU communicates with the main controller via I2C.

subrequirements.name: Motor encoders
subrequirements.description: The robot uses motor encoders to track the position and speed of the motors.

subrequirements.name: Type
subrequirements.description: The motor encoders are hall effect quadrature encoders.

subrequirements.name: Resolution
subrequirements.description: The motor encoders have a resolution of 26 counts per revolution.

subrequirements.name: Partial connection
subrequirements.description: Only one line of the quadrature encoder is connected to the controller, per motor.

subrequirements.name: Actuators
subrequirements.description: This requirement describes the 2 motors controlling the motion of the robot.

subrequirements.name: Type
subrequirements.description: The motors are brushed DC motors of type GA37-520.

subrequirements.name: Controller type
subrequirements.description: The motors are sharing a dual H-Bridge controller of type TB6612FNG.

subrequirements.name: Push button
subrequirements.description: The robot has a momentary push button to allow the user to switch between modes of operation.

subrequirements.name: Communication ports
subrequirements.description: The robot has access to various communication ports to transmit and receive information.

subrequirements.name: UART
subrequirements.description: The robot can be connected to a computer via UART.

subrequirements.name: Bluetooth
subrequirements.description: This requirement describes the Bluetooth communication port.

subrequirements.name: Type
subrequirements.description: The Bluetooth communication port is a BT-16 module.

subrequirements.name: IR
subrequirements.description: The robot can receive information using an IR remote.

subrequirements.name: LEDs
subrequirements.description: This requirement describes the LEDs of the robot platform.

subrequirements.name: Built-in LED
subrequirements.description: The Arduino shall provide a built-in LED, connected to the microcontroller according to the pinout diagram

subrequirements.name: Multicolor external LEDs
subrequirements.description: There are four digital, multicolor LEDs located at each corner or the robot.

subrequirements.name: Smartphone application
subrequirements.description: The product comes with a Smartphone application allowing remote control and operation of the robot via the Bluetooth interface.

requirements.name: Project description
requirements.description: This requirement describes the present Elegoo Tumbller project.

subrequirements.name: Purpose
subrequirements.description: The purpose of this project is to generate the embedded firmware for the Elegoo Tumbller robot only using AI.

subrequirements.name: Scope
subrequirements.description: The scope of the firmware generation goes from low-level mirocontroller configuration, up to higher level application modules.

subrequirements.name: Inputs
subrequirements.description: This requirement describes the inputs of the project.

subrequirements.name: Requirements
subrequirements.description: The project shall provide requirements that the code generation algorithm shall comply to.

subrequirements.name: Knowledge
subrequirements.description: The project shall provide a knowledge database guiding the design principles of the code generation algorithm.

subrequirements.name: Hardware description
subrequirements.description: The project shall contain a hardware description of the system to which the controller is connected.

subrequirements.name: Datasheets
subrequirements.description: The project shall provide access to the datasheets of all the components of the system to which the controller is connected. The datasheets are linked to the relevant item requirement.

subrequirements.name: Microcontroller pinout
subrequirements.description: The project shall provide a description of the microcontroller pinout, which identifies the function and connected module for each pin.

subrequirements.name: Ouputs
subrequirements.description: This requirement describes the required outputs of the project.

subrequirements.name: Build outputs
subrequirements.description: Binary outputs shall be generated in bin and hex formats.

subrequirements.name: Documentation
subrequirements.description: This requirement describes the documentation that shall be produced by the generation algorithm.

subrequirements.name: Code comments
subrequirements.description: The code shall not contain comments unless absolutely necessary to explain corner cases or exceptions.

subrequirements.name: Self-documenting code
subrequirements.description: The code shall have clear structuring, interfaces, variable and function names such that the code documents itself.

subrequirements.name: Code architecture
subrequirements.description: Documentation shall include a high level diagram representation of the code structure, which includes blocks representing the major drivers and modules of the generated code, the key elements of their respective interfaces, and the information flow between them.

subrequirements.name: Modules description
subrequirements.description: For each module of the generated code,

subrequirements.name: C source code
subrequirements.description: C source files shall be produced as an output of the AI generation algorithm.

requirements.name: Basic functionality
requirements.description: This requirement contains all the sub-requirements that are necessary to implement the basic functionality of the Elegoo Tumbller robot.

subrequirements.name: Balancing
subrequirements.description: The robot shall balance itself at all times and maintain a vertical position by controlling its motors.

subrequirements.name: Moving forward
subrequirements.description: The robot shall be able to move forward upon user request.

subrequirements.name: Moving backward
subrequirements.description: The robot shall be able to move backward upon user request.

subrequirements.name: Turning left
subrequirements.description: The robot shall be able to turn left upon user request.

subrequirements.name: Turning right
subrequirements.description: The robot shall be able to turn right upon user request.

subrequirements.name: Stopping
subrequirements.description: The robot shall be able to stop from a moving state upon removal of the user request to move.

requirements.name: Modes of operation
requirements.description: This requirement describes the modes of operation of the Elegoo Tumbller robot.

subrequirements.name: Stationary (default)
subrequirements.description: The robot can maintain a stationary position. This is the default mode of operation.

subrequirements.name: IR control
subrequirements.description: The robot can be controlled using an IR remote control.

subrequirements.name: Auto-follow
subrequirements.description: The robot can follow a person or an object.

subrequirements.name: Obstacle avoidance
subrequirements.description: The robot can avoid obstacles.

subrequirements.name: Bouncing mode
subrequirements.description: The robot can move in a bouncing mode.

subrequirements.name: Glowing in different LED colors
subrequirements.description: The robot can glow in different LED colors.

requirements.name: C source code
requirements.description: This section describes the requirements of the generated C source code.

subrequirements.name: Output folder
subrequirements.description: The C source code shall be generated in a dedicated folder.

subrequirements.name: Code formatting
subrequirements.description: The generated C source code shall be formatted according to the provided clang format file.
